T02bsu023_u:7: pratītyasamutpāda iti kasmāducyate? sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko
T02bsu023_u:9: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate |
T02bsu023_u:14: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ? yadidaṃ
T02bsu023_u:17: asati bīje aṅkuro na bhavati, evaṃ yāvat asati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati |
T02bsu023_u:18: sati tu bīje aṅkurasya abhinirvṛttirbhavati, evaṃ yāvat sati ca puṣpe phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati
T02bsu023_u:24: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti |
T02bsu023_u:25: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartita iti |
T02bsu023_u:26: atha bīje sati ca kāraṇabhūte aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati, evaṃ yāvatpuṣpe sati
T02bsu023_u:28: evaṃ ca bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ ||
T02bsu023_u:29: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 109) punaḥ kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt |
T02bsu023_u:33: tatra pṛthividhāturbījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti, abdhāturbījaṃ snehayati, tejodhāturbījaṃ
T02bsu023_u:39: evamaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātavaścāvikalā bhavanti, tatasteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ samavāyādbīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati |
T02bsu023_u:40: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya dhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomi iti |
T02bsu023_u:41: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomi iti |
T02bsu023_u:42: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti |
T02bsu023_u:43: atha punaḥ satsu pratyayeṣu teṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati |
T02bsu023_u:44: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto nākāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaśca |
T02bsu023_u:49: pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto
T02bsu023_u:51: kathaṃ na śāśvatata iti? yasmādanyo 'ṅkuro 'nyadbījam, na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ
T02bsu023_u:53: ato na śāśvatataḥ || kathaṃ punarnocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro
T02bsu023_u:55: api ca bījaṃ ca nirudhyate, tasminneva samaye 'ṅkura utpadyate, tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat |
T02bsu023_u:57: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśo bījādaṅkura ityato na saṃkrāntitaḥ ||
T02bsu023_u:59: bījamupyate(vyāptitvāt - avyā) vipulaṃ phalamabhinirvartayati, ityataḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ || kathaṃ tatsadṛśānubandhataḥ?
T02bsu023_u:60: yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśaṃ phalamabhinirvartayati, ityataḥ tatsadṛśānubandhataśceti |
T02bsu023_u:67: pañcānāṃ prādurbhāvo jātiriti), tatra jarāmaraṇaṃ na prajñāsyate |
T02bsu023_u:70: punaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmapyevaṃ na bhavati - vayamavidyayā abhinirvartitā iti |
T02bsu023_u:73: jarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jātyābhinirvartita iti |
T02bsu023_u:74: atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttiebhavati prādurbhāva eva, evaṃ yāvat jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati |
T02bsu023_u:77: draṣṭavyaḥ? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ
T02bsu023_u:78: | tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pṛthivīdhātuḥ katama iti? yo 'yaṃ
T02bsu023_u:79: kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ(saṃparkāt) kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayati, ayamucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ || yaḥ punaḥ kāyasya parigrahakṛtvaṃ(svīkārasaṃcayakṛtyaṃ)
T02bsu023_u:80: karoti, ayamucyate abdhātuḥ || yaśca punaḥ kāyasya aśitaṃ pītaṃ bhakṣitaṃ
T02bsu023_u:81: paripācayati ayamucyate tejodhātuḥ || yaḥ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ(vāyorākarṣaṇamāśvāsaḥ etatkṛtyaṃ)karoti, ayamucyate vāyudhātuḥ || yaḥ kāyasyāntaḥśauṣiryabhāvamabhinirvartayati, ayamucyate ākāśadhātuḥ || yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena
T02bsu023_u:83: sāsravaṃ(sāvaraṇaṃ) manovijñānam, ayamucyate vijñānadhātuḥ || asatsu pratyayeṣu kāyasyotpattirna bhavati |
T02bsu023_u:86: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinatvamabhinirvartayāmīti |
T02bsu023_u:87: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 111) abdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasyānuparigrahaṃ karomīti |
T02bsu023_u:93: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayaviśeṣairjanita iti || atha ca satsu pratyayeṣu kāyasyotpattirbhavati ||
T02bsu023_u:94: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā (na mukto na baddho) na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na puruṣo na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na ca mama, nāpyanyasya kasyacit |(evaṃ
T02bsu023_u:97: tatrāvidyā katamā? yā eṣveva ṣaḍdhātuṣu ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā
T02bsu023_u:101: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu, amī ucyante saṃskārā iti || vastuprajñaptiḥ(indriyavijñānacetanā) vijñānam ||
T02bsu023_u:118: ye cāpyanye evamādayaḥ kleśāḥ, upakleśā upāyāsāḥ (manovikalpajātamāyāśāṭhyadainyakāmarāgādayaste sarve |
T02bsu023_u:122: avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante - puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā aniñjyopagāśceti
T02bsu023_u:124: puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati, apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ apuṇyopagameva
T02bsu023_u:125: vijñānaṃ (MŚālSū, Vaidya 112) bhavati, aniñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmaniñjyo pagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati |
T02bsu023_u:127: tadevaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam || nāmarūpavivṛddhyā ṣaḍbhirāyatagadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyā(ḥ) pravartante, tannāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamucyate || ṣaḍbhya āyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyasamūhāḥ
T02bsu023_u:128: pravartante, ayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ucyate || yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati, tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate, iyaṃ sparśapratyayā vedanā ucyate ||
T02bsu023_u:132: pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇairviyogo bhavatu aparityāgaḥ, bhūyobhūyaśca prārthanā,
T02bsu023_u:133: idaṃ tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamityucyate || evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena manasā vācā, sa upādānapratyayo bhava ityucyate || yat karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirvṛttiḥ, sā bhavapratyayā jātirityucyate || yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāmupacayaparipākādvināśo bhavati, tadidaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityucyate |
T02bsu023_u:139: tatra karma vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karoti, tṛṣṇā vijñānabījaṃ snehayati, avidyā vijñānabījamavakirati
T02bsu023_u:141: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti |
T02bsu023_u:142: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti |
T02bsu023_u:145: vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayai (pratītyotpādai)rjanita iti || api tu
T02bsu023_u:147: nāmarūpāṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati || sa cāsau nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na
T02bsu023_u:149: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogāt ṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādātprabuddhaṃ (MŚālSū, Vaidya 113) vijñānabījaṃ tatratropapattyā mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati, asvāmikeṣu
T02bsu023_u:150: (dharmanairātmyena) adharmeṣu (pudgalanairātmyena) amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālambanasvabhāveṣu,
T02bsu023_u:155: cakṣuśca pratītya rūpaṃ ca ālokaṃ ca ākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītya utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam
T02bsu023_u:156: tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣurāśrayakṛtyaṃ karoti, rūpamālambanakṛtyaṃ karoti, āloko
T02bsu023_u:157: 'vabhāsakṛtyaṃ karoti, ākāśamanāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti, tajjamanasikāraḥ samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karoti |
T02bsu023_u:159: yadā cakṣurādhyātmikamāyatanamavikalaṃ bhavati, evaṃ rūpālokākāśatajjamanasikārāścāvikalā bhavanti, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyāccakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati |
T02bsu023_u:164: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
T02bsu023_u:165: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya anāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
T02bsu023_u:166: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti
T02bsu023_u:169: atha ca satsu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati |
T02bsu023_u:170: evaṃ śeṣāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ yathāyogaṃ kartavyam || tatra pratītyasamutpāde na kaściddharmo asmāllokātparalokaṃ saṃkrāmati, (iti śāśvatāntaniṣedhaḥ), asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptihetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt (peyālam) |
T02bsu023_u:171: yathā agnirupādānavaikalyānna jvalati, upādānāvaikalyācca jvalati, evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyā āyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati, asvāmikeṣu adharmeṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu,
T02bsu023_u:174: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 114) tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ |
T02bsu023_u:178: kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye maraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, anye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti |
T02bsu023_u:179: na tu ya eva maraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, ta eva aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavantīti na
T02bsu023_u:180: ato hetorna śāśvatataḥ || kathaṃ punarnocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu maraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti, nāpyaniruddheṣu |
T02bsu023_u:182: tasminneva samaye aupapattikāśca skandhāḥ punarbhavanti, prādurbhavanti,
T02bsu023_u:184: ato nocchedataḥ || kathaṃ na saṃkrāntita iti?
T02bsu023_u:186: ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ || kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ?
T02bsu023_u:187: parīttaṃ karma kriyate, vipulaphalavipāko 'nubhūyate, ataḥ parittahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ || kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ?
T02bsu023_u:190: yaḥ kaścidbhadanta śāradvatīputra imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā tathāgatena samyakpraṇītaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitaṃ ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad (vi)parītaṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akṛtaṃ asaṃskṛtaṃ apramitaṃ anāvaraḥaṃ śivaṃ abhayaṃ ahāryaṃ avyayaṃ avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
T02bsu023_u:191: asatyato 'saktataḥ asārato rogato gaḥḍataḥ śalyato 'nityataḥ duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ samanupaśyati, sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati -
T02bsu023_u:193: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati - kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyahamanāgate 'dhvani, āhosvinna bhaviṣyāmyahamanāgate 'dhvani, ko nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmīti |
T02bsu023_u:194: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati - kiṃ nvidam,
T02bsu023_u:195: kathaṃsvididam, ki santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāma iti ||
T02bsu023_u:197: vyavacchedaḥ, saṃskārā bhavaśca karmavartmano vyavacchedaḥ, pariśeṣaṃ duḥkhavartmano vyavacchedaḥ
T02bsu023_u:199: apekṣā, vijñānaṃ yāvadvedaneti eṣā pratyutpannāpekṣā, tṛṣṇā yāvadbhava iti
T02bsu023_u:200: eṣā aparāntikī apekṣā, ata ūrdhvamasya pravṛttiriti |
T02bsu023_u:204: sāmagryā saṃskṛtaṃ pravartate, visāmagryā na pravartate |
T02bsu023_u:205: hanta, vayamevaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvā asya saṃyogasya asyāśca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ, na cātyantopaśamaṃ sarva - saṃskārāṇāmadhigamiṣyāmaḥ sattvaparipācanatāyai" iti || idaṃ saṃkṣepānmohaśodhanam ||
T02bsu023_u:207: tadāha - rūpaṃ tu dvividham, - varṇataḥ saṃsthānataḥ |
T02bsu023_u:210: etatsarvaṃ rūpaṃ pāramārthikaṃ nāstīti pratijñā, svarūpeṇa hetuḥ |
T02bsu023_u:211: svahetunā tathaiva janito yathāvat paramārthikaṃ tu |
T02bsu023_u:214: "pararūpeṇa rūpaṃ nāsti, svarūpeṇa vā ubhayarūpeṇa vā anubhayarūpeṇa veti" śāstram || utpādakahetupakṣo vikalpaḥ ||
T02bsu023_u:215: "na sat nāsat na sadasat na cāpyanubhayātmakam" |
T02bsu023_u:220: "na svati nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ |
T02bsu023_u:221: utpannā jātu dṛśyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana" ||
T02bsu023_u:222: tatra sato vidyamānasyotpādāyogāt vidyamānasyotpāde niravadhijanmaprasaṅgenānavasthā syāt
T02bsu023_u:223: asadutpāde śaśaviṣāṇādīnāmutpādaprasaṅgāddhetoḥ prāk asaditi cet, tadeva cintyate -
T02bsu023_u:224: hetoḥ kimutpadyate sadasadvā? ubhayātmakasyotpāde viruddhadharmayorekasvabhāvatābhyupagamaḥ kathaṃ syāt? bhavatu viruddhadharmabandhanasvarūpaṃ ca pararūpanimittakam |
T02bsu023_u:225: tacca pararūpaṃ viruddhadharmābhyāsaḥ, sa ca bhedakaḥ |
T02bsu023_u:226: yatra parapratipattistatra kiṃ svarūpapratipattireva nāsti? pratītirasti, na svarūpapratipattiḥ
T02bsu023_u:227: iyameva pratītiriti cet, tarhi apratītireva pratītiḥ |
T02bsu023_u:229: ghaṭaḥ paṭo na bhavatīti cet, miśrapratītirapi nāsti |
T02bsu023_u:230: tasmāt ghaṭo bhāvābhāvātmakaḥ, ataḥ siddhāḥ dvirūpatā |
T02bsu023_u:232: 116) satyam, yadi vyavahartavyaikaśarīratāṃ tyaktvā prasahya rūpasyābhāvasya kiṃcidrūpaṃ syāt, tatra hyananyagatikobhayābhāvasvarūpopalambhāt abhāvo vyavahriyate ghaṭasyeti |
T02bsu023_u:235: atha hetuśabdo na nityaikaheturapekṣitaḥ, tasyotpāde sarvadaiva udayavyayau syātām, nityaikahetūtpannāpekṣāyā ayogāt |
T02bsu023_u:237: anityaḥ, anityaṃ prati vikalpe sarvaṃ pūrvadāpadyate ||
T02bsu023_u:238: ataḥ svasmāt svayamutpadyate, anyasmādvā? nādyaḥ, prāganutpannaḥ svayamutpadyate |
T02bsu023_u:239: kimanutpannena rūpeṇa utpannena vā? anutpannena rūpeṇa anutpanna evotpannaḥ, anutpādena rūpeṇotpādāyogāt |
T02bsu023_u:240: atha prāgabhāvaḥ anutpannaśabdavācyaḥ, tat kiṃ prāgabhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇotpadyate? yadyevam,
T02bsu023_u:241: tadā abhāvanaṃ bhāvaḥ, paścādbhāva iti cet, tatra kimabhāva eva bhāvo
T02bsu023_u:242: bhavati? evaṃ sati abhāvasya punaḥpunarutpāde na prayojanamutpaśyāmaḥ,
T02bsu023_u:243: anavadhirutpādaśceti pararūpeṇotpāde ca apūrvakotpāda evāṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt |
T02bsu023_u:244: na caivaṃ siddhāntaḥ, utpannena utpāde vā saṃsāreṣu utpādaviramābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ prayojanābhāvaśca
T02bsu023_u:247: atha vā - svayameva anyarūpeṇa utpadyate, svātmani
T02bsu023_u:249: na parata utpādaḥ, kutastatra siddhasya vā asiddhasya vā? uktamatrottaram - siddhasya utpādena
T02bsu023_u:252: prasahu(jya?)nte, dvayorbhāve kathaṃ na bhavati iti nyāyāt ||
T02bsu023_u:255: tadyathā - yat svatantraṃ na tat kādācitkam,
T02bsu023_u:259: yat kādācitkaṃ tatparatantram, yathā kuśūlatalanimīlitaṃ bījamaṅkurajananaṃ prati |
T02bsu023_u:262: yat paratantraṃ tatpratītyasamutpannam, yathā tadeva vījam |
T02bsu023_u:267: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpāda sabhāvato 'sti |
T02bsu023_u:268: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya uktaḥ yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ ||
T02bsu023_u:269: iti vacanaṃ dhāryaṃ manasikāryaṃ sarvathā sarvadā sarvadarśibhiḥ ||
